topic.title: HPE Helion 2.0 Development Platform: Install the Application Lifecycle Service (ALS)

ul.li: The HDP Installer 2.0, also known as HDPI, must already be installed.
A properly configured clouds.yaml file. Note that there is no specific sub-section in the clouds.yaml file for the Application Lifecycle Service.

body.section:
Install ALS
SSH into the HP Helion OpenStack Deployer. (This is the same location where the HDPI has been installed.)
Source the Virtual Environment.source /opt/stack/venv/dev_platform_installer-devplat_installer-1.0.0/bin/activate
List the available ALS versions to install: openstack hdpi list --os-cloud mycloud | grep als The output should look similar to:als | wscatalog.#### | 2.0.0.0 | available
Select the most recent ALS version to install and view the details of the package:openstack hdpi show wscatalog.#### --os-cloud mycloud
Install the Appliation Lifecycle Service
If you pre-downloaded the installation file, run the following command to install it:cd <directory where the pre-downloaded file is> openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install <filename>
If you did not pre-download the installation file, run the following command to download and install it:openstack --os-cloud mycloud hdpi als install wscatalog.2800When installing pre-downloaded files, make sure you run the installer from the same directory where the installation files are. If the installer cannot find a file with the name you provided in the local directory, it will attempt to download the files again. Downloading may take a significant amount of time; depending on network traffic, it could take 20-90 minutes.During installation, the output will appear similar to: Downloading Application Lifecycle Service which is available Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (available) Application Lifecycle Service not downloaded (downloading) ... Application Lifecycle Service is (downloaded) Staging Application Lifecycle Service in Glance/Swift Application Lifecycle Service is staged UI installed for application lifecycle service Create service endpoint for service application lifecycle service Completed installing application
